amendment.description: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 5 in the Congressional Record of September 9, 1997, to prohibit funds apprpropriated in the bill for the U.S. Customs Office from being used to allow the importation into the U.S. any material mined, produced, or manufactured by forced or indentured child labor.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sanders amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
